Name: TSE (KassenSichV)
Description: Record and export point of sale (POS) transactions to comply with KassenSichV regulation.  The Kassensicherungsverordnung (KassenSichV) requires German retailers with tax obligations to connect their electronic cash registers to a technical security system (TSE) and report all POS transactions. This app is a cloud TSE solution and is certified as compliant by the GoBD. To comply with KassenSichV regulation, use this app to record and export POS transaction data. The data, which comes directly from Shopify’s unaltered database, can be shared with your local tax office if required.   The Kassensicherungsverordnung (KassenSichV) requires German retailers with tax obligations to connect their electronic cash registers to a technical security system (TSE) and report all POS transactions. This app is a cloud TSE solution and is certified as compliant by the GoBD. To comply with KassenSichV regulation, use this app to record and export POS transaction data. The data, which comes directly from Shopify’s unaltered database, can be shared with your local tax office if required.  more         Activate TSE per retail location and record transactions. Deactivate at any time         Quickly export data for any location where TSE is active         Receive a ZIP file sent to your email address for easy access and sharing         Includes DSFinV-K, TSE certificates, and transactional data made through Shopify         TSE data appears on printed receipts for auditor checks
Categories: Legal, Taxes, Legal, Taxes

Name: Keeper—Recover Abandoned Carts
Description:
Increase sales by remembering customers’ abandoned shopping cart details across multiple devices.  Recover carts and increase sales.
With Keeper, customers who login across multiple devices will find their shopping cart waiting for them, ready to complete their order.

How does it work?
When a customer who has started shopping on one device (i.e. their mobile), logs into your store on another device (i.e. their laptop), they’ll find their shopping cart waiting for them. This makes it easy to complete their order, resulting in more sales for your store.

Recover more abandoned carts today!   Recover carts and increase sales.

This app is a cloud TSE solution and is certified as compliant by the GoBD. To comply with KassenSichV regulation, use this app to record and export POS transaction data. The data, which comes directly from Shopify’s unaltered database, can be shared with your local tax office if required.  more         Activate TSE per retail location and record transactions. Deactivate at any time         Quickly export data for any location where TSE is active         Receive a ZIP file sent to your email address for easy access and sharing         Includes DSFinV-K, TSE certificates, and transactional data made through Shopify         TSE data appears on printed receipts for auditor checks
Categories: Legal, Taxes, Legal, Taxes

Name: Keeper—Recover Abandoned Carts
Description:
Increase sales by remembering customers’ abandoned shopping cart details across multiple devices.  Recover carts and increase sales.
With Keeper, customers who login across multiple devices will find their shopping cart waiting for them, ready to complete their order.

How does it work?
When a customer who has started shopping on one device (i.e. their mobile), logs into your store on another device (i.e. their laptop), they’ll find their shopping cart waiting for them. This makes it easy to complete their order, resulting in more sales for your store.

Name: Kickbooster
Description:
#What’s affiliate marketing?
Affiliate marketing (sometimes called referral marketing or influencer marketing) is a sales and marketing strategy where you, the merchant or store owner, encourage your customers, media partners, and brand advocates to refer new business to you in exchange for a reward when that referral leads to a sale.

#Why Kickbooster?

Name: Kit Karts
Description: Effortlessly capture lost sales with abandoned cart recovery  With automatic abandon cart recovery, you can rest easy knowing that all those lost revenue opportunities will be made up for in no time at all. Kit Karts automatically aggregates all abandoned carts from the previous day and sends them to customers whenever you prefer.   With automatic abandon cart recovery, you can rest easy knowing that all those lost revenue opportunities will be made up for in no time at all. Kit Karts automatically aggregates all abandoned carts from the previous day and sends them to customers whenever you prefer.  more         Manage abandoned carts through Kit Karts or send them automatically         This \"set-it-and-forget-it\" app gives you the time to focus on your business         Increases your sales and customer satisfaction rates
Categories: Abandoned cart, Abandoned cart

Name: MNG Kargo
Description: Sipariş sonrası kargo takip kodu entegrasyonu. Kapıda Ödemeli kargo için uygun + Özel Kargo Etiketi  MNG Kargo Shopify Entegrasyon uygulaması, sipariş sonrası kargo süreçlerinizi otomatik hale getirir. Kargo Takip Kodu ile ilgili bilgileri MNG Kargo sisteminden alır ve sipariş içerisine ekler. Müşteriyi email ve SMS ile bilgilendirir. Kargonuz teslim edildiğinde siparişi otomatik arşivler. Gönderici ödemeli ve Kapıda Ödemeli kargo türleri için uygundur. Tahsilatlı kargolar için tutarı sipariş toplamından alarak kapıda ödenmesini sağlar. Kullanmak için MNG Kargo API bilgileri gerekmektedir.   MNG Kargo Shopify Entegrasyon uygulaması, sipariş sonrası kargo süreçlerinizi otomatik hale getirir. Kargo Takip Kodu ile ilgili bilgileri MNG Kargo sisteminden alır ve sipariş içerisine ekler. Müşteriyi email ve SMS ile bilgilendirir. Kargonuz teslim edildiğinde siparişi otomatik arşivler. Gönderici ödemeli ve Kapıda Ödemeli kargo türleri için uygundur. Tahsilatlı kargolar için tutarı sipariş toplamından alarak kapıda ödenmesini sağlar. Kullanmak için MNG Kargo API bilgileri gerekmektedir.  more         Sipariş sonrasında Kargo Takip Kodu otomatik olarak alınarak siparişe eklenir.         Takip kodu geldiğinde müşteriye otomatik olarak Email ve SMS gönderilir.         Kapıda Ödemeli Kargolar (Tahsilatlı Kargo) için uygundur.         Toplu Etiket ve Sevk İrsaliyesi ile tüm kargolarınızın barkodu anda basılabilir.
Categories: Shipping labels, Shipping labels

Name: Keep on Hold Wishlist
Description: Keep on Hold Wishlist. Boost Sales & Loyalty. One-Click Save-for-Later Button!  Keep on Hold adds \"Add to Wishlist\" button to product pages. Shoppers can \"save for later\" items in the cart instead of removing them to be forgotten. Keep on Hold turns abandoned cart items into a wishlist for future purchases. Integration with Shopify login allows the wishlist to be saved across multiple devices. Keep on Hold analytics help generate more sales by displaying cart transactions (adds/removes) and which products are in the wishlist to follow up with customers.   Keep on Hold adds \"Add to Wishlist\" button to product pages. Shoppers can \"save for later\" items in the cart instead of removing them to be forgotten. Keep on Hold turns abandoned cart items into a wishlist for future purchases. Integration with Shopify login allows the wishlist to be saved across multiple devices. Keep on Hold analytics help generate more sales by displaying cart transactions (adds/removes) and which products are in the wishlist to follow up with customers.  more         Save removed cart items from cart page. Product page wishlist button.         Customize language and icon based on your theme.         Optional login for shoppers to save their wishlist across devices.         Reports of cart and wishlist transactions and populate products on you store.         Boost Sales & Loyalty by allowing your shoppers to save items for later.
Categories: Wishlists, Wishlists

Name: Keepoala: Return Analytics
Description: Keepoala is your digital return expert. Your average return quota: -5%. Your average CLV: +27%.  With Keepoala, we incentivize your customers to avoid returns by granting points for not sending back online orders. This is done with the help of a standalone Keepoala App + integrated loyalty program. Nudging schemes within the app have a positive effect on the individual shopping behavior and therefore on the return quota of you as a participating online shop or brand. Collected points are redeemed for vouchers, opening up a new customer acquisition channel; increasing retention as well.   With Keepoala, we incentivize your customers to avoid returns by granting points for not sending back online orders. This is done with the help of a standalone Keepoala App + integrated loyalty program. Nudging schemes within the app have a positive effect on the individual shopping behavior and therefore on the return quota of you as a participating online shop or brand. Collected points are redeemed for vouchers, opening up a new customer acquisition channel; increasing retention as well.  more         Return reduction via nudging-based loyalty program         Increased CLV & EBIT margin via less returns and low-returning repeat customers         Best in class return analytics with dashboard; additional add-on return portal
Categories: Loyalty and rewards, Sales analytics, Loyalty and rewards, Sales analytics

Name: Keyshop
Description: Sell keys, URLs, unique numbers, or any other short text as products.  With Keyshop you can easily upload or generate thousands of keys, URLs, or any other optionally-unique text (up to 65,000 bytes) and sell them as if they were standard Shopify products.   With Keyshop you can easily upload or generate thousands of keys, URLs, or any other optionally-unique text (up to 65,000 bytes) and sell them as if they were standard Shopify products.  more         Keys can be displayed directly in the \"Thank You\" page and/or sent by e-mail.         In addition to a list, keys can be retrieved from your website.         Items with both a key and physical shipment are supported.         Customizable templates for your fulfillment options.         Actively supported. Feel free to request new features!
Categories: Digital downloads, Digital downloads
